document_data.name: Ardonell Firemoon
document_data.mainbody: '''Ardonell Firemoon''' was a [[Harper]] agent who harbored anti-[[Cormyr]] views in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Ardonell Firemoon was known for her passionate views on the growing political power of [[Cormyr]]. Her speeches often riled up unrest towards the Land of the Purple Dragon. Another notable quality of hers was the knowledge of old lore, ancient stories, and legends that surprised even [[Elminster Aumar]] hiself.
document_data.Possessions: Ardonell Firemoon's gear included an enchanted ''+2 [[chainmail]]'', a ''[[spellblade]]'' that made her untochable to ''[[lightning bolt]]'' spells, and a pair of ''[[boots of speed]]''.
